title: Registry persistence layer (src/lib/registry.ts)
description: Create server-side registry module at src/lib/registry.ts. Persists registered repo paths to ~/.config/foolery/registry.json. Functions: loadRegistry, saveRegistry, addRepo (validates .beads/ exists), removeRepo, listRepos. Uses node:fs/promises.

title: remove unnecessary fields from bead creation
description: the fields Assignee, due date, estimate are stupid.  remove them from the create new bead screen.

title: Multi-repo bd.ts support
description: Add cwd option to exec() in src/lib/bd.ts. Add optional repoPath param to all exported functions (listBeads, readyBeads, queryBeads, showBead, createBead, updateBead, deleteBead, closeBead, listDeps, addDep). Modify all API routes in src/app/api/beads/ to extract _repo param and forward as repoPath.

title: Registry and browse API routes
description: Create API routes: src/app/api/registry/route.ts (GET/POST/DELETE for registry CRUD) and src/app/api/registry/browse/route.ts (GET with ?path= for directory listing). Add registry schemas to src/lib/schemas.ts. Add RegisteredRepo and DirEntry types to src/lib/types.ts.

title: Repo switcher and page integration
description: Create src/components/repo-switcher.tsx dropdown. Modify src/app/page.tsx for conditional landing (registry or redirect). Create src/app/registry/page.tsx. Modify src/app/beads/page.tsx for repo-aware loading. Modify src/app/beads/[id]/page.tsx for ?repo= param. Add repo column to bead-columns.tsx. Update bead-table.tsx navigation. Add registry command to command-palette.tsx. Add header with switcher to layout.tsx.

title: bulk edit
description:
we want to be able to bulk edit by checking a checkbox next to each item (or a top left corner table checkbox that selects all)

we should be able to edit

type, priority, labels, status

title: Fix BeadTypeBadge crash on unknown type
description: BeadTypeBadge crashes when bd returns a type not in the typeConfig map. Already fixed by adding fallback config and widening the type prop to string. Close this bead.

title: Repo registry screen component
description: Create src/components/repo-registry.tsx. Shows registered repos as cards (name, path, remove button). Add Repository button opens DirectoryBrowser. Empty state with onboarding text. Uses React Query for registry API.

title: Directory browser UI component
description: Create src/components/directory-browser.tsx. Dialog with navigable directory listing: breadcrumb path bar, editable path input, scrollable folder list with isBeadsRepo badges, Select button. Uses shadcn Dialog, React Query for browse API, lucide icons.

title: Client-side registry API and store
description: Create src/lib/registry-api.ts with client fetch wrappers (fetchRegistry, addRepoToRegistry, removeRepoFromRegistry, browseDirectory). Modify src/lib/api.ts to add repo param to all functions + fetchBeadsFromAllRepos aggregation. Modify src/stores/app-store.ts to add activeRepo and registeredRepos state.

title: Fix Bun.spawn -> Node execFile in bd.ts
description: bd.ts was using Bun.spawn but the app runs under Node.js. Already fixed by replacing with node:child_process execFile. Close this bead.

title: Directory browser logic (src/lib/browse.ts)
description: Create server-side directory listing module at src/lib/browse.ts. Functions: listDirectory(path) returns DirEntry[] with isBeadsRepo flag, getParentPath. Filters hidden dirs, handles permission errors, checks for .beads/ child.
